pages.text: Alex's Delight adds new food recipes to Minecraft, using ingredients sourced from the Alex's Mobs mod. $(br2)Combine exotic meats and plants to create delicious and unique dishes.
Start by gathering ingredients like Lobster Tails, Orca Whiskers, and Shoebill Feathers. $(br2)Use them to craft new recipes like Alex's Meat Stew, Shoebill Salad, and more.
Each dish provides unique effects to aid you on your adventures. $(br2)Boost your health, gain speed, or regenerate faster with these flavorful meals from Alex's Delight!
